name: OMG! My Key!
description:
This is my first Unity game,so its kinda short and glitchy. You have to find a car key for John,but there is countdown timer ,you only got 2 minutes.  It's EXTREMLY hard  ,so 99% will fail first time ;D ,but its raining ,so its also calming.

There is 2 options for download:
-DAY VERSION is easy one. 
-NIGHT VERSION is literally impossible to complete from first time.

post your opinion in comment,or contact me if you have any question.

Donation will support this game grow and any other my games.


Thank you for playing!
